name: Space Defense Contractor
description:
Never trust the lowest bidder!

Story:

How did we end up in this situation? A siege on our ship, and our lives depend on the lowest bidder - an incompetent defense contractor.
Can we entrust our lives in him to fortify our defenses, or will he doom us all?

Instructions:

Defend the ship by placing turrets! It's cheaper to upgrade your existing turrets than to buy new ones, but there's a chance your contractor might mess up and downgrade them too. Stop the dice on a high number to upgrade it for a bargain price! 

Credits:

  • Logan Bannigan - 2D Art, Level Design
  • Ellie Ciot - 2D/3D Art
  • Mack Reese - Developer

Space Defense Contractor also uses free 3D assets provided by Kenney.

Created in under 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, following the theme: "Roll of the Dice"!
